links.title: Why Buying A Tesla Is The Worst Decision You Can Make
links.description: Before Tesla even came to life, it was already making a buzz online and offline. Actually, if you were following its founder, Elon Musk, the updates arrive right on your phone regularly, which makes you desire it more.

messages.body: $TSLA Tesla Strikes Deal to Give 50,000 Australian Homes Solar Power https://finance.yahoo.com/news/tesla-strikes-deal-50-000-200013122.html

links.title: Tesla Strikes Deal to Give 50,000 Australian Homes Solar Power
links.description: The state government of South Australia announced Sunday that it had struck a deal with Tesla to install as many as 50,000 solar-power systems on homes, at no cost to residents. The system would include both solar panels and Tesla Powerwall batteries, and would become part of a decentralized electric grid managed by software.

links.title: Tesla looks to take solar mainstream with Home Depot partnership
links.description: While Elon Musk is preparing for this week's launch of the Falcon Heavy rocket, his other company is also preparing for a launch. Tesla has made a deal with Home Depot to sell both the PowerWall and Tesla's solar panels at 800 Home Depot locations.

links.title: Tesla Tapped by South Australia Anew in Virtual Power Plant Plan
links.description: Solar panel, battery announcement comes before state election Cites analysis showing plant will reduce energy bills by 30% South Australia plans to roll out solar panels and Tesla Inc. batteries to at least 50,000 homes to form what its government says will be the world's largest virtual power plant.

links.title: The World is Getting [en]So Hot: El Niño, La Niña, and Rising Global Temperature
links.description: The world has been rapidly warming, at a rate of 1.4°C per 100 years, since 1950 according to NOAA data. The chart illustrates this warming for El Niño years (red), La Niña years (blue), and ENSO-neutral years (grey) (ENSO is the El Niño-Southern Oscillation). This warming trend (dotted lines) is significant regardless of the ENSO...
